name: Crocus
body:
### Vision
On May 1st 2015, a first leaf was spotted in Sainte-Doroth√©e, Laval Qc. This was the beginning of spring there. On May 3rd 2015, a first leaf was spotted in Quebec City.

You see the map of spring 2015, and a slider representing time. On May 1st you see one marker on the map. On May 3rd, you now see 2 markers on the map. Guess where ;)

I think we have our first test. Let's write it!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
